name: FeatureCardTwentySix
description: Full-bleed media carousel feature cards with bottom text overlay and arrow navigation.

description.example: Handpicked by our team to help you start strong

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

structure.title: string - Card title displayed over media
structure.description: string - Card description displayed over media
structure.imageSrc: string - Path to background image (optional if videoSrc provided)
structure.videoSrc: string - Path to background video (optional if imageSrc provided)
structure.imageAlt: string - Alt text for background image
structure.videoAriaLabel: string - Aria label for background video
structure.buttonIcon: LucideIcon - Icon for the action button

featureRules.note: Each feature requires title, description, media (image or video), and buttonIcon. Cards display with frosted glass gradient overlay.

propsSchema.features: FeatureItem[] (required) - Array with title, description, imageSrc/videoSrc, buttonIcon, buttonHref/buttonOnClick
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureCardTwentySix
    title="Featured Courses"
    description="Handpicked by our team to help you start strong."
    tag="Popular"
    tagIcon={Star}
    textboxLayout="default"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    features={[
      {
        title: "Web Development",
        description: "Learn modern web technologies.",
        imageSrc: "/course1.jpg",
        buttonIcon: ArrowRight,
        buttonHref: "/courses/web"
      },
      {
        title: "UI/UX Design",
        description: "Master design principles.",
        imageSrc: "/course2.jpg",
        buttonIcon: ArrowRight,
        buttonHref: "/courses/design"
      }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for showcasing features or courses with strong visual media
Use high-quality images or videos for full-bleed display
Each card requires a buttonIcon for the action button
dont: Do not use without media for each feature
Do not use for text-heavy content
